:KitKat::

She looked at Phobia. "Thank you for all your help."
She looked down at her arm. "Megatron had a stratagy.  He just didn't 
share it with us proir to the battle.  I'm sure it would have worked, 
had things not gone the way they did."  She knew that was a flat out 
lie.  She should have seen it comming that Megatron sent them out 
there for revenge.  The other group turned him down and he wanted to 
show them that he was the true leader. It turned out he wasn't.  he 
thought with anger and malicve, not with the cunning of  a true pred 
leader.  

She turned to Phobia. "Megatron knew what he was doing, well, sort 
of." She looked at the ground then shook her head.
"I don't want to think anout this now. I have to go out and hunt. 
I'll see you later on Phobia. OK?" With that, she walked off. She 
transformed into wolf and went out into the forest.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia watched the interaction between KitKat and company.
> 
> "You've done nice work" he said, observing her arm, "Of course none 
> of this would have happened if Megatron wouldn't have led us into 
> battle without a strategy." 
> He carefully choosed his words.He didn't want to sound overly 
> treasoness, but if someone else came up with the idea he wouldn't 
> disagree.
>
